results.definition: (of a clause) capable of standing syntactically alone as a complete sentence
examples: the main (or independent) clause in a complex sentence has at least a subject and a verb

results.definition: any very large body of (salt) water

examples: the main doors were of solid glass

results.definition: a principal pipe in a system that distributes water or gas or electricity or that collects sewage
of force; of the greatest possible intensity
